Deprecated API

Deprecated Methods

          Call getActiveWindow().close() instead

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefaultStyle() instead

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead.

          use getDefinition instead. 
com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.Terminal.queryTerminalSize()
          Being deprecated since 2.0.1 in favor of getTerminalSize() 
com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.text.ANSITerminal.queryTerminalSize()
           
com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.text.UnixTerminal.queryTerminalSize()
           
com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Panel.setBetweenComponentsPadding(int)
          Use the layout manager to set the padding between components 
com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.GUIScreen.setTitle(String)
          Use a GUI background renderer instead
